result_list.explanation: Don Carlos drawing his sword suggests a preparation for a violent action, which fits the aggression category.
Sitting in a chair is a general character action and falls under the action category.
The character Valérian singing is related to vocal expression and thus fits the delivery category.
Making a movement to stand is movement related, and it fits the movement category as it indicates a character's change of position.
result_list.stgdir: Il fait un mouvement pour se lever.

result_list.explanation: The description of a setting with a grove, trees, and cabins defines the play's location, fitting the setting category.
result_list.stgdir: Le théâtre représente un bocage dont les arbres sont couverts de frimas et de glaçons. On voit dans le lointain plusieurs cabanes de Sauvages dont les toits sont couverts de neige. Parmi ces cabanes, on en remarque une plus spacieuse et moins éloignée que les autres.

result_list.explanation: Throwing a rose on the ground involves handling an object, so it fits the object category.
result_list.stgdir: Elle jette la rose par terre.

result_list.explanation: Placing tablets on a bench is an interaction with an object, placing it in the object category.
result_list.stgdir: Il met les tablettes sur le banc.

result_list.explanation: Clarimand reading out loud relates to the manner of delivery, so it belongs to the delivery category.
Making a purse jingle might indicate an interaction with an object, in this case, the purse; thus, it fits the object category.
The direction 'À Casimir' indicates to whom something is addressed, fitting the toward category.
